Comment from floor: We need standards for anonymisation. The only bad analysis is unreproducible, untransparent analysis. #ctdata
Comment from floor: "You can't give general access. You must give private access." Data in dossiers are commercially confidential. #ctdata
Question from floor: How will the release of these data be funded? Urging Agency to publish in domains with open-access agreements. #ctdata
Susan Forda: Concerned that results of poor analyses will be picked up by the media, especially early in life-cycle. #ctdata
Susan Forda: Would prefer those who want to re-analyse the data to approach companies directly. #ctdata
@bengoldacre: Need to be proportionate - if we require a priori consent, we will not get access to data from older studies. #ctdata
